alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 10:07PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Suffolk County through 1100 PM EST... At 1006 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Port Jefferson to 10 miles southeast of Davis Park. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to around 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Islip, Brentwood, Commack, Riverhead, Huntington Station, Centereach, Shirley, Deer Park, Lindenhurst, Medford, Southold, Hauppauge, Ronkonkoma, Huntington and Manorville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Suffolk; Northwest Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
